synopsis: Official music video for the song Watashi no Naka no Gensou-teki Sekaikan Oyobi Sono Kengen wo Souki Saseta Aru Genjitsu de no Dekigoto ni Kansuru Ichi Kousatsu by the fictional band Irodorimidori. It is the 4th song in the franchise and focuses on Nagi Kobotoke.

title.jp: Watashi no Naka no Gensou-teki Sekaikan Oyobi Sono Kengen wo Souki Saseta Aru Genjitsu de no Dekigot
